channel.title: Npc emotes

item.title: Npc emotes
item.dc:creator: @bxexnxnxextt bxexnxnxextt
item.description:
@bxexnxnxextt wrote:

can somebody set up a command like this (below) to make the npc do an emote??? help is appreciated =)

if (npcs[i].npcType == npcID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "MESSAGE"; } }

Read full topic
